person.persName: John B. Gowen (Christian County, Kentucky, merchant and asylum manager)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, merchant and asylum manager. South Carolina native. Married to Fanny Gowen on February 10, 1841. Father of Emma Gowen and Lou Gowen. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1850. Merchant in Christian County in 1850. Sheriff of Christian County in 1860. Board member and manager of the Western Lunatic Asylum in 1865.
